name: Charred Snow
description:
You’re staying in a small cabin on top of a mountain as a snowstorm hits. You’re safe if you stay inside the cabin, the only problem is you’ll eventually run out of firewood and freeze to death. Thus you need to venture out, into the snowstorm to gather wood, but who knows what might be lurking out there…

(Spoiler alert, there's nothing out there)

Controls:

Move around - WASD / Arrow Keys

Jump - Space

Crouch - L Ctrl / Left Mouse Button

Look around - Mouse

Interact - Right Mouse Button
